Package xxl.core.relational.query.operators

Class Summary
Aggregations This class provides static methods for creating ready to use instances of an aggregation node in a directed acyclic graph.
Distincts This class provides static methods for creating ready to use instances of a distinct node in a directed acyclic graph.
Enumerations This class provides static methods for creating ready to use instances of an enumeration node in a directed acyclic graph.
Equivalences This class provides static methods for creating ready to use instances of an equivalence node in a directed acyclic graph.
Excepts This class provides static methods for creating ready to use instances of an except node in a directed acyclic graph.
Files This class provides static methods for creating ready to use instances of a node in a directed acyclic graph that reads or writes its data from or to a specified file.
Intersects This class provides static methods for creating ready to use instances of an intersect node in a directed acyclic graph.
Joins This class provides static methods for creating ready to use instances of a join node in a directed acyclic graph.
Mappings This class provides static methods for creating ready to use instances of a mapping node in a directed acyclic graph.
Operators This class provides static methods for creating ready to use instances of an operator node in a directed acyclic graph.
Projections This class provides static methods for creating ready to use instances of a projection node in a directed acyclic graph.
Randoms This class provides static methods for creating ready to use instances of a random node in a directed acyclic graph that provides random data.
Renamings This class provides static methods for creating ready to use instances of a renaming node in a directed acyclic graph.
Selections This class provides static methods for creating ready to use instances of a selection node in a directed acyclic graph.
Sockets This class provides static methods for creating ready to use instances of a node in a directed acyclic graph that is able to send its data via a socket or to use a socket to receive its data.
Streams This class provides static methods for creating ready to use instances of a stream node in a directed acyclic graph that converts a relation into a stream.
Unions This class provides static methods for creating ready to use instances of an union node in a directed acyclic graph.
Windows This class provides static methods for creating ready to use instances of a (sliding) window node in a directed acyclic graph that converts a stream into a relation.
 

Enum Summary
Files.Type An enumeration providing the local metadata fragments used in a file operator's global metadata for identifing the file operator's type.
Joins.Subtype An enumeration providing the local metadata fragments used in a join operator's global metadata for identifing the join operator's subtype.
Joins.Type An enumeration providing the local metadata fragments used in a join operator's global metadata for identifing the join operator's type.
Operators.Mode An enumeration providing the local metadata fragments used in a node's global metadata for identifing the node's mode.
Sockets.Type An enumeration providing the local metadata fragments used in a socket-operator's global metadata for identifing the socket-operator's type.
Streams.Type An enumeration providing the local metadata fragments used in a stream operator's global metadata for identifing the stream operator's type.
Windows.Type An enumeration providing the local metadata fragments used in a window operator's global metadata for identifing the window operator's type.

If you want to be informed on new versions of XXL you can subscribe to our mailing-list.
Send an email to xxl-request@lists.uni-marburg.de without subject and the word \"subscribe\" in the message body.
